scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, wearing a crown of thorns and a loincloth. To the left stands the Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle, her hands clasped in sorrow. To the right is Saint John the Evangelist, clad in a red robe, also with hands joined in grief. The figures are set against a landscape with rolling hills and mountains in the background. The scene is framed by an arched border decorated with floral motifs and gold leaf.
